title: South Lake Tahoe Ski Lease- Dogs OK,Hot tub, 4 beds/ 2 ba, Fenced yard
posting_body: Four bedroom, 2 bathroom chalet in South Lake Tahoe available this winter.
This is a true "Tahoe style cabin" with knotty pine wainscoting, wood beamed ceilings, original brick fireplace, and brand new
6- person hot tub overlooking a large, pretty yard with scattered pine trees.
About 2/3 of the house is recently remodeled and updated and all-around
it's just a lovely, warm, cozy winter home.

This is a 4 bedroom / 2 bathroom house on 2 levels (sleeps 9 easily with great bed layout), with parking for 3 or 4 cars, in a charming neighborhood that is a 5 minute walk to the Lake, and the same distance to every kind of store, cafe, restaurant, bank- you name it- that you could need.
It is also about 2 minutes' drive to Heavenly, and the same to the casinos if that's what floats your boat!
No stairs to climb or hills to drive up/ get stuck in when the big snow comes.
Dogs are welcome, huge fenced yard, and there is an amazing 75 acre meadow that looks dead onto the mountains, about 2 minutes walk from the house to let the dogs loose.
I can even give you dog walking services information if that's of use or need.
22 pics available on request, and I can tell you more about pricing at that time, too.
You pay utilities and snowplow fee.
Hoping to find a group for the 4 months of January through April.

House was priced at $8000/month through a rental agency, so I'm charging $1000/ month less on my own - been managing properties for 20 years and have excellent references from past tenants, ski leases tending to be seamless and problem free.
Feel free to inquire- thank you!
Happy to FaceTime, show in person, share references from other tenants... all are options.
